entry.title: Pépinière 27
entry.content:
With more than 100 startups incubated in a general and multi-disciplinary ecosystem, Pépinière 27 is a Parisian incubator offering both a flexible hosting and support services, but also a rich and inspiring infrastructure, like a natural greenhouse where knowledge flourishes.

The Info Box  
🏢 Incubator Name Pépinière 27
🌐 Location Paris, France
🏰 Size 3500 m2 of offices, 100 m2 of common areas
+ gym room, relaxation area, …
🔢 Startups incubated 100
🛍 The “Petit plus” Pépinière 27 is labeled “Paris Innovation” by the City of Paris
+ Access to the “PIA” (Paris Innovation Amorçage) funding program
💵 Price Starting at 250€/month

What’s more inspiring than a natural-looking greenhouse with an important infrastructure and quality accommodation, all in the heart of Paris ? Powered by the Paris Innovation label, Pépinière 27 is the ultimate friendly incubator with nearly 4 million euros raised by only 8 startups of the incubator.

In this friendly ecosystem, you have the choice between open or closed offices according to your needs, with a large common area free co-working, a waiting room, 9 meeting rooms fully equipped and relaxation areas (gym, patio). The team is composed of only 10 people with always a presence in the HQ.

An accompanying offer

Providing to startups an offer of hosting to work is something great, but an incubator would not be an incubator if it did not offer a continuous support. Thus, Pépinière 27 offers business workshops, networking meetings, conferences, networking with experts in your field, as well as an access to a social platform bringing together all incubated startups.

Pépinière 27 offers 3 programs for startups. Offices open starting at 560€/month (+ fees) or private (starting at 680€/month + fees) with the possibility of joining the Associate Program, allowing you to get :

  • A postal address at 27 rue du Chemin Vert (Paris 75011) with the management of your receptions and mailings stamped.
  • A permanent access badge to the premises (24h/24 and 7/7)
  • An access to the meeting rooms for the reception of your customers (according to availability)
  • A permanent access to the gym room
  • An access to the cafeteria
  • A profile of your company on the Pépinière 27’s intranet (news feed, events, meeting rooms booking, chat, …)

Certified Paris Innovation by the City of Paris

As a Paris Innovation certified incubator by the Paris City Hall, startups located in Pépinière 27 can apply for a funding with Paris Innovation Amorçage funding program. Created to support the development of startups hosted in incubators labeled Paris Innovation, it is aimed at any innovative project in the seed or development phase. Do not hesitate to consult the detailed presentation of this program and to contact, as the case may be, the Paris Regional Office of Bpifrance Île de France.

To learn more about Pépinière 27, the reception is open from 9am to 6:30pm, if you want to have a preview of the atmosphere and the place, don’t hesitate to go there. It’s only 5 minutes from the Place de la Bastille !

🌐 Contact 🌐
Pépinière 27
27 Rue du chemin vert
75013 Paris
+33 (0)1 75 77 87 00
contact@pepiniere27.fr
entry.summary: With more than 100 startups incubated in a general and multi-disciplinary ecosystem, Pépinière 27 is a Parisian incubator offering both a flexible hosting and support services, but also a rich and inspiring infrastructure, like a natural greenhouse where knowledge flourishes.

entry.title: NUMA
entry.content:
Not just an open space for entrepreneurs, NUMA is an international hub of more than 300 organizations, including CAC40 leaders and hundreds of startups. Training and follow-up are at the heart of NUMA’s philosophy.

The Info Box  
🏢 Incubator Name NUMA
🌐 Location Paris, France
🔢 Startups incubated 300
🛍 The “Petit plus” NUMA offers a free open-space with bar on the ground floor
💵 Price Free co-working space
Privatization of rooms from 1200€/day

It all started in 2000 with Silicon Sentier, an entrepreneur association with more than 180 partner companies. Their initial objective was to encourage meetings between entrepreneurs and to allow new projects to emerge and floor on the Next Big Thing. The idea was to design a network capable of promoting and facilitating the development of entrepreneurship at the national level, and that’s what became NUMA today.

NUMA is not only an open space for entrepreneurs or small businesses today, it’s a hub of more than 300 organizations, including CAC40 leaders and hundreds of startups - with a presence in Paris, Barcelona, Mexico, Toulouse, Berlin and even New York.

Not only an open-space

The first time I went to NUMA, it was just to have a place where to discuss professionally with other students, entrepreneurs and business leaders, I also discovered a free space co-working on the ground floor, with possibility to rent different rooms for private meetings.

But my biggest surprise was to discover the “formations”. Today, the challenge is not only to master the technical aspect of a project but also the notions of management, intrapreneurship, design thinking and digital marketing. And guess what? That’s exactly what NUMA offers. In fact, we understand quickly that we do not invest only in a HQ or a place to work, but in a long-term support of your project.

“To infinity and beyond”

Regarding the incubation program, NUMA brings its expertise to startups already on the market and having a consequent turnover, for 3.5 % equity participation. NUMA’s philosophy is based on the development of the startups’ business and network, the implementation of a rigorous and effective methodology for executing their strategy as well as long-term support through a mentoring system with experts.

Looking for something fun to do there, to discover the atmosphere of NUMA ? Do not hesitate to visit “La Cantine”, the first collaborative workspace created in Île-de-France Region, where many celebrities have passed to make conferences and exchange with members, like Mark Zuckerberg.

🌐 Contact 🌐
NUMA Paris
39 Rue du Caire
75002 Paris
+33 (0)1 40 13 64 40
entry.summary: Not just an open space for entrepreneurs, NUMA is an international hub of more than 300 organizations, including CAC40 leaders and hundreds of startups. Training and follow-up are at the heart of NUMA’s philosophy.
